EmailTemplate.name: WC-2012-07-Become a Partner.Becoming a Partner - Thank You 051518
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome To The Turbonomic Partner Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Thank you for your interest in joining the Turbonomic Partner Program. We are reviewing your application and will be in touch with you shortly to further discuss your business and determine what opportunities there are for us to partner together. If you have any questions in the meantime, please contact PartnerDesk@Turbonomic.com <[[mailto: PartnerDesk@Turbonomic.com]]>. Best Regards, Turbonomic
